DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate possible clinical effect adipokines , ( ghrelin , resistin adiponectin ) , obese non-obese patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Adipokines Obese Non-obese Egyptian Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Seventy select PCOS patient recruit study , divide two group base body mass index ( BMI ) : 35 obese ( BMIâ‰¥ 25 kg/m2 , group A ) , 35 non-obese ( BMI < 25 kg/m2 , group B ) . In addition , 35 healthy non-obese woman ( BMI < 25 kg/m2 ) bw enrol control ( group C ) . Serum level FSH ( follicle stimulate hormone ) , LH ( luteinizing hormone ) , T ( testosterone ) , glucose , insulin , adiponectin , resistin resistin bw detect , compare difference among three group
